bio:
Imperial Couriers are used by the Imperial Legion to deliver war-essential supplies and letters, as part of the ongoing war against the Stormcloak rebellion against the Empire. 
These couriers are usually found on the main roads of Skyrim. They are a specialized variant of Imperial soldier. They are often running and in a hurry to reach their next destination.
They wear a full set of Imperial light armor and wield an Imperial sword during combat. They also carry an Imperial bow and approximately a dozen steel arrows. They also carry a steel dagger.
name: Imperial Courier
